note:
ultrarunner, writer, & Developer Experience Engineer @ the Developer Success Lab

Background in language teaching pedagogy, Second Language Acquisition, and classroom-based research.

Passionate about integrating social and behavioral science into the tech world, particularly in enhancing how software teams and practitioners learn, work, and thrive.

Clinical Scientist researching how #software #developers can cope and thrive through stressful circumstances. Expertise in #stress, #anxiety, cognitive-behavioral change and interventions, measurement, and experimental methods. Clinical Psychology PhD.

#psychology #science #research

The SMBC guy.

Scop of Bea Wolf.
I program, write, and teach. Co-founder of Software Carpentry and It Will Never Work in Theory; co-editor of The Architecture of Open Source Applications.
